LibLabReviews 0.1.0
  • Reference

ACLU Review Template

Source: R/use_templates.R
use_aclu_review_template.Rd

Apply ACLU Analytics team review templates to your github repository to help standardize reviews and ensure quality and accuracy of our work

use_aclu_review_template(type = "analysis", repo = ".")

use_aclu_pr_template(type = "analysis", repo = ".")

use_aclu_issue_template(type = "analysis", repo = ".")

use_aclu_label_template(type = "analysis", repo = ".")

Arguments

type

Type of repository. Defaults to "analysis" which is the only fully built out template in base version
repo

Repository. Defaults to "." - base path. We use `repo` instead of `path` here to align with `git2r` standards.

Value

invisible. Provides cli based messages as completes

Examples

# apply all of the template items
use_aclu_review_template()
#> ✖ ./.github/pull_request_template.md already exists. Skipping file copy.
#> ✔ Pull request template applied to repository
#> ✖ ./.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/coding_practices.md already exists. Skipping file copy.
#> ✖ ./.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/correctness_approach.md already exists. Skipping file copy.
#> ✖ ./.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/data_accuracy.md already exists. Skipping file copy.
#> ✖ ./.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/documentation.md already exists. Skipping file copy.
#> ✖ ./.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/performance.md already exists. Skipping file copy.
#> ✖ ./.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/readability.md already exists. Skipping file copy.
#> ✖ ./.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/reproducibility.md already exists. Skipping file copy.
#> ✖ ./.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/results_accuracy.md already exists. Skipping file copy.
#> ✖ ./.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/results_completeness.md already exists. Skipping file copy.
#> ✖ ./.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/suggestions.md already exists. Skipping file copy.
#> ✖ ./.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/config.yml already exists. Skipping file copy.
#> ✔ Issue templates applied to repository
#> ✖ ./.github/LABEL_TEMPLATE/config.yml already exists. Skipping file copy.
#> ✔ Label templates added to .github folder

# apply the PR template to the repository
use_aclu_pr_template()
#> ✖ ./.github/pull_request_template.md already exists. Skipping file copy.
#> ✔ Pull request template applied to repository

# apply issue templates to the repository
use_aclu_issue_template()
#> ✖ ./.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/coding_practices.md already exists. Skipping file copy.
#> ✖ ./.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/correctness_approach.md already exists. Skipping file copy.

# apply labels to the repository
use_aclu_label_template()
